channel.title: 🏢 Yandex Research on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Yandex Research on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Lower Bounds and Optimal Algorithms for Non-Smooth Convex Decentralized Optimization over Time-Varying Networks
item.description: First optimal algorithms matching lower bounds for non-smooth convex decentralized optimization over time-varying networks are presented, substantially improving theoretical performance.
